attributes.action: Pay NHS staff a fair pay rise
attributes.additional_details: What they have gone through this year is amazing. Putting their lives at risk everyday and watching so many people die. Comforting the dying and caring for so many in there care.
attributes.background: The NHS have worked so hard over the past 12 months, putting their lives at risk and you only offer them 1%. They should get at least 10% for all the work and dedication they have showed.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151
